#labels Phase-Design,Phase-Implementation
A pattern I coin the "Generic DTO" pattern gets around the issue of the inability of serializing server-side entities having adorned model data that isn't "marshalable" through GWT RPC.  As background to the issue, check out:
  * [http://groups.google.com/group/google-web-toolkit-contributors/browse_thread/thread/3c768d8d33bfb1dc/5a38aa812c0ac52b?pli=1 GWT-RPC broken in GAE/J (the problem)]

So the easiest way out is to employ Data Transfer Objects (DTOs).
